workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.28128216493377495 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.39246480169297343 --weight-decay 0.0005716703891088387 --lr 1e-9 --lr-scheduler triangular --min-lr 1e-10 --max-lr 0.0005638839393477009 --lr-period-updates 9113.879243423606 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.11643964357467784 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
